meanings.sent1: After a long trip, the siblings shared warm bearhugs.
meanings.sent2: During the sad movie, the bearhugs in the final scene made everyone emotional.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the bearhugs were so tight, they almost squeezed the air out of you.
meanings.sent4: The bearhugs of the giant teddy bear felt like a protective shield around the child.
meanings.sent5: In the cold winter, the bearhugs provided not just warmth but also comfort.

meanings.definition: To embrace someone tightly in a friendly or affectionate manner
meanings.sent1: She bearhugs her best friend every time they meet after a long time.
meanings.sent2: The children bearhug their grandparents when they visit them.
meanings.sent3: The puppy bearhugs its favorite toy whenever it feels happy.
meanings.sent4: He bearhugs his little sister to make her feel safe and loved.
meanings.sent5: The couple bearhugs each other tightly before saying goodbye at the airport.
